p: For the topping, zaatar, ground oregano leaves, sesame seeds, and sumac spices were obtained from Safadi Center for Agriculture and Rural Development, Akkar, Lebanon. Xanthan gum was purchased from Middle East Food Ingredients Sal (MEFI) Offshore, Beirut, Lebanon. The additional ingredients (salt, yeast, sunflower oil, and ground white sugar) were all purchased from the local market. Three samples were prepared for the proximate fatty acids and macrominerals analysis. Sample 1 contained refined wheat flour as a control, sample 2 contained raw chickpea flour, and sample 3 contained processed chickpea flour.
